entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:33 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
